title: Zygor Guides 4.0.7790 (January 13th, 2014)
description:
Zygor Guides update  Version: 4.0.7831
Released on: January 13th, 2014

Created by r4tulan on Tuesday, 14 January 11:45:58 a.m PST

Install instructions: 

1) DO NOT USE THE OFFICIAL ZYGOR LAUNCHER FOR ANY REASON.

2) Extract the .zip and drop the ZygorGuidesViewer folder into your WoW/Interface/Addons folder and overwrite the current installation.


Mac-Only install instructions:

1) Put the ZygorGuidesViewer folder in Hard Drive/Applications/World of Warcraft/Interface/AddOns.

2) (Optional) Open World of Warcraft, login, click the Addons button on the Character Select Screen, make sure Zygor is selected, and check the "Load out of date addons" box. Some users have stated that this step is rarely/never necessary


Changelog:

-------

[B] Achievements
Fixed skipping errors throughout the "Surveying the Damage" achievement
Added coordinates for fishing at Lake Elune'ara
Fixed coordinates for fishing in Northern Stranglethorn
Fixed a grammar error regarding fishing for Bluefish and Mudfish schools
Fixed a missing description for "The Longest Day"

[B] Reputations
Clarified that you can only gain Argent Crusade reputation from Northrend Dungeons

[B] Gear
Added several fishing items to the gear exception list

[H] Loremaster
Azshara:
Added missing npc's display ID
Added extra tips
Corrected guide step that wasn't completing
Added additional waypoints for extra quest mobs
Added extra waypoints for improved navigation between quests
Added more specific instructions for a few difficult quests
Added step that'll speed up travel for the next step
Added missing flight path for Bitter Reaches
Linked a quest pet's skill to guide

Desolace:
Added extra tips
Added additional waypoints for extra quest mobs
Linked a quest spell to guide
Corrected the Ethel Rethor flight path, guide step now completes as intended
Corrected guide step that was auto-completing
Made minor changes throughout to improve guide consistency

Silverpine Forest:
Added extra tips
Added additional waypoints for extra quest mobs
Combined two similar guide steps
Moved quest waypoint to better spawn
Added missing turn in step

Swamp of Sorrows:
Added extra tips
Linked missing quest item to guide
Made minor changes throughout to improve guide consistency
Added additional waypoints for extra quest mobs

[H] Professions
Enchanting:
The amount of Nightmare Vine and Arcane dust require for leveling has been increased
Infinite Dust requirement increased

[Gear]
Fixed an issue that caused Hunter weapons to not show up in the Gear Finder.

[Travel]
Serpent's Overlook flight path now requires the 'Last Piece of the Puzzle' quest to be usable by the travel system.
